title: An Act to improve care and prepare for the new era of Alzheimer’s and dementia

abstracts.abstract: Senate, July 21, 2025 -- The committee on Aging and Independence to whom was referred the petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 468) of Adam Gomez, Jason M. Lewis, Paul W. Mark, John F. Keenan and other members of the General Court for legislation to improve care and prepare for the new era of Alzheimer’s and dementia by developing a public awareness campaign on brain health, report the accompanying bill (Senate, No. 2554).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Aging and Independence
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Health Care Financing

related_entities.name: the committee on Health Care Financing

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

committee on Senate Ways and Means

sponsorships.name: Joint Committee on Aging and Independence
